text: oba āyudha suḷu pramāṇayakin yuktava siṭiyā vuvada kam næta, sampūrṇa āyudha valin sannaddhava siṭiyā vuvada kam næta, oba (payin gamanin hō vāhanayan mata nægī hō) piṭatva gos, allāhgē mārgayehi obagē vastūnda, paṇada, pūjā kara yuddha karanu. oba dænuma ættavun vaśayen siṭinnehu nam, meyama obaṭa itāmat hon̆daya
